createPromo((uint256,uint256,address,add.details: This function calculates the price for creating a promo based on the number of streams specified in the `promotion` struct, multiplied by the `_promoCreationPrice`

params.promotion: A `Promotion` struct containing the details of the promotion
params.uri: The URI for the promo metadata

params.paymentRecipient: The address that will receive payments
params.paymentToken: The address of the token used for payments
params.promoCreationPrice: The price (in paymentToken units) for creating a new promo

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

createPromo((uint256,uint256,address,add.notice: Creates a new promo with specified promotion details and URI

documentation.text: @notice Checks that the address is not zero address

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(address => struct Promotion storage ref[] storage ref)
struct Promotion storage ref[] storage ref
function (struct Promotion storage ref[] storage pointer,struct Promotion storage ref)
mapping(address => struct Promotion storage ref[] storage ref)
struct Promotion storage ref[] storage ref

documentation.text:
@title PromoFactory contract
 @notice A contract that creates promotions using the Promo collection.
 Every promotion is a nft (ERC721).
 The contract is managed by Owner role.
 The owner can set on a smart contract:
 - the price of creating a promotional share
 - payment token
 - payee
